description:
stack@controller1:~$ nova hypervisor-list
ERROR (ClientException): Unexpected API Error. Please report this at http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/ and attach the Nova API log if possible.
<class 'nova.exception.ComputeHostNotFound'> (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-d98480fd-fcca-4660-b992-7e9a1fa2e94b)
stack@controller1:~$ nova --version
2.35.0

What I did:
1. install  devstack on controller node
2. install  devstack on compute node
title: Unexpected API Error - nova hypervisor-list

comments.content:
stack@controller1:~$ nova hypervisor-list
ERROR (ClientException): Unexpected API Error. Please report this at http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/ and attach the Nova API log if possible.
<class 'nova.exception.ComputeHostNotFound'> (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-d98480fd-fcca-4660-b992-7e9a1fa2e94b)
stack@controller1:~$ nova --version
2.35.0

What I did:
1. install  devstack on controller node
2. install  devstack on compute node
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yangbo-jiang

comments.content: You can try again after starting nova-compute on controller node to see if the error still exists.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~liyingjun

comments.content: According to the "ComputeHostNotFound: Compute host controller1 could not be found" line in the error log it seems that  nova-api was not able locate the host on which the database is served. Could you make you sure that 'controller1' resolves to the correct host?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cihand

comments.content:
Cleanup
=======

This bug report has the status "Incomplete" since more than 30 days
and it looks like that there are no open reviews for it. To keep
the bug list sane, I close this bug with "won't fix". This does not
mean that it is not a valid bug report, it's more to acknowledge that
no progress can be expected here anymore. You are still free to push a
new patch for this bug. If you could reproduce it on the current master
code or on a maintained stable branch, please switch it to "Confirmed".
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller
